801.question: how small of a dataset did they train on?

4-Table1-1.png: They trained on a dataset of 16150.</s>
They trained on a dataset of 16150 entries.</s>

802.question: what was their character error rate?

6-Table4-1.png: The character error rate (CER) for the Shenma distilled model was 7.87%, for the Amap model further trained with Amap dataset it was 6.81%, and for the Shenma model trained with sMBR on Amap dataset it was 6.26%.</s>

The character error rate (CER) for the Shenma distilled model was 7.87%, for the Amap model further trained with Amap dataset it was 6.81%, and for the Shenma model trained with sMBR on Amap dataset it was 6.26%.</s>
6-Table3-1.png: The character error rate (CER) for the 9-layers LSTM model was 2.49, for the 2-layers regular-trained LSTM it was 3.66, and for the 2-layers distilled LSTM it was 2.63.</s>
The character error rate (CER) for the 9-layers LSTM model was 2.49.</s>
6-Table2-1.png: The character error rate (CER) for the models was as follows: 3.72 for 6-layer model, 3.93 for 7-layer model, 3.81 for 8-layer model, and 3.87 for 9-layer model.</s>

802.answer: 2.49% for  layer-wise training, 2.63% for distillation, 6.26% for transfer learning.

803.question: what was their character error rate?

6-Table3-1.png: The character error rate (CER) for the 9-layers LSTM model was 2.49, for the 2-layers regular-trained LSTM it was 3.66, and for the 2-layers distilled LSTM it was 2.63.</s>
The character error rate (CER) for the 9-layers LSTM model was 2.49.</s>
6-Table2-1.png: The character error rate (CER) for the models was as follows: 3.72 for 6-layer model, 3.93 for 7-layer model, 3.81 for 8-layer model, and 3.87 for 9-layer model.</s>

803.answer: Their best model achieved a 2.49% Character Error Rate.

804.question: which lstm models did they compare with?

6-Table3-1.png: They compared the LSTM models with 9-layers, 2-layers regular-trained LSTM, and 2-layers distilled LSTM.</s>
They compared the 9-layers LSTM, 2-layers regular-trained LSTM, and 2-layers distilled LSTM models.</s>
6-Table2-1.png: They compared the LSTM models with a teacher of 8-layers sMBR model and a teacher of CE model.</s>
They compared the 6-layer, 7-layer, 8-layer, and 9-layer LSTM models with a teacher model that is an 8-layer sMBR model.</s>

804.answer: Unidirectional LSTM networks with 2, 6, 7, 8, and  9 layers.
